name: Space invaders (itch) (DEV_andrei)
description:
Controls:

  1. a, d to move
  2. space bar to shoot
  3. r to restart the game

The character, enemy, etc. models:

  1.  Icons made by Smashicons from www.flaticon.com
  2. Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
  3. https://icon-icons.com/icon/darth-vader-star-wars/34501
  4.  Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

This is my first game. Please show some suport to make me develop more gaames!!
